list.title: Network Project - Design of a secure architecture according to specifications
details: Analysis of specifications and definition of the target network architecture.
Design of a secure network infrastructure: VLANs, ACLs, Multi-WAN, private 5G.
Implementation of security devices: firewall, VPN.
Planning for scalability, redundancy, and high availability.
Functional, secure architecture compliant with budget

list.title: Development Project - Obstacle Detection System (Arduino, Smart Home)
details: Design and implementation of an obstacle detection system based on Arduino.
Integration of ultrasonic sensors for real-time detection.
Programming and configuration of the Arduino microcontroller.
Development of a prototype oriented towards Smart Home / home automation.
Testing and validation of the system to improve accuracy.
